channel.title: 🏢 Samsung AI Cambridge on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Samsung AI Cambridge on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: QBB: Quantization with Binary Bases for LLMs
item.description: QBB: A novel post-training quantization method for LLMs dramatically improves efficiency by replacing multiplications with summations, achieving state-of-the-art results with minimal accuracy loss.
